languages.text: "Этот мон-кай погубил своих сородичей лишь потому, что не погубил моих?" {n}Лицо Ирлиэт облачается в саван вины.{/n} "Я... не желала такого исхода, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "Этот мон-кай погубил своих сородичей лишь потому, что не погубил моих?" {n}Лицо Ирлиэт облачается в саван вины.{/n} "Я... не желала такого исхода, элантах".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."
languages.original_text: "Этот мон-кай погубил своих сородичей лишь потому, что не погубил моих?" {n}Лицо Ирлиэт облачается в саван вины.{/n} "Я... не желала такого исхода, элантах".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Este mon-keigh ha matado a los suyos solo porque no ha podido matar a los míos?». {n}Un velo de culpabilidad ensombrece el rostro de Yrliet.{/n} «Yo... no quería que esto acabase así, elantach».
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."

traits.locale_text: «¿Este mon-keigh ha matado a los suyos solo porque no ha podido matar a los míos?». {n}Un velo de culpabilidad ensombrece el rostro de Yrliet.{/n} «Yo... no quería que esto acabase así, elantach».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这个猴子仅仅是因为没能杀害我的族人，就屠戮了他自己的族人？”{n}伊莉耶特脸上笼罩着愧疚的阴影。{/n}“我……并没有希望事情变成这个样子，外界人。”
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."

traits.locale_text: “这个猴子仅仅是因为没能杀害我的族人，就屠戮了他自己的族人？”{n}伊莉耶特脸上笼罩着愧疚的阴影。{/n}“我……并没有希望事情变成这个样子，外界人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet se couvre d'un voile de culpabilité.{/n} « Ce mon-keigh a tué ses semblables simplement parce qu'il ne pouvait pas tuer les miens ? Je... ne voulais pas que ça se termine ainsi, elantach. »
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet se couvre d'un voile de culpabilité.{/n} « Ce mon-keigh a tué ses semblables simplement parce qu'il ne pouvait pas tuer les miens ? Je... ne voulais pas que ça se termine ainsi, elantach. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「このモン＝ケイが自分の血族を殺したのは、私の血族を殺せなかったからなのか？」{n}ユリエットの顔は罪の意識に覆われている。{/n}「私は…このような結末を望んだのではない、エランタ」
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「このモン＝ケイが自分の血族を殺したのは、私の血族を殺せなかったからなのか？」{n}ユリエットの顔は罪の意識に覆われている。{/n}「私は…このような結末を望んだのではない、エランタ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey hat seine eigenen Verwandten getötet, nur weil er die meinen nicht töten konnte?" {n}Der Schleier der Schuld wirft einen Schatten auf Yrliets Gesicht.{/n} "Ich ... wollte nicht, dass es so endet, Elantach."
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey hat seine eigenen Verwandten getötet, nur weil er die meinen nicht töten konnte?" {n}Der Schleier der Schuld wirft einen Schatten auf Yrliets Gesicht.{/n} "Ich ... wollte nicht, dass es so endet, Elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu mon-keigh, benim soydaşlarımı öldüremediği için mi kendininkileri öldürdü?" {n}Yrliet'in yüzüne pişmanlığın gölgesi düşüyor.{/n} "Ben... Bunun böyle sonlanmasını istememiştim elantach."
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh killed his own kin just because he could not kill mine?" {n}Yrliet's face is shadowed by a shroud of guilt.{/n} "I... did not wish for it to end this way, elantach."
